articles.title: Explainer: Omicron 'stealth' COVID-19 variant BA.2 now dominant globally - CGTN
articles.description: A sub-variant of the highly transmissible Omicron version of coronavirus known as BA.2 is now dominant worldwide, prompting surges in many countries in Europe and Asia and raising concern over the potential for a new wave in the United States.

articles.title: Erik ten Hag 'wants to bring Brazil winger Antony with him to Manchester United' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Brazilian has caught the attention of several top European clubs following a string of impressive performances for Ajax, scoring 12 goals and making 10 assists in his 33 appearances this season.
articles.content:
Erik ten Hag wants to bring Ajax winger Antony with him to Manchester United if he is appointed manager at Old Trafford, according to reports.

articles.author: Paula Slier in Moscow
articles.title: WAR IN EUROPE: The West doesn't get it – Russians aren't 'zombified', and most of them are pro-Putin - Daily Maverick
articles.description: By far the majority of Russians, while heartbroken, believe Russia was forced into the war.
articles.content:
